Key Match Events: Cleveland Cavaliers guard Darius Garland drove to the basket against Oklahoma City Thunder guard Shai Gilgeous-Alexander during the second half.
Oklahoma City Thunder were two-and-a-half-point underdogs against the Cavs.
Donovan Mitchell had an uncharacteristically poor performance.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Isaiah Hartenstein faced foul trouble.
Oklahoma City Thunder only shot 36 percent from the 3-point line.
Cleveland Cavaliers used a crisp zone defense in the final frame.
The game had 30 lead changes and was tied eight times.
Post-Match Reflections: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander expressed his commitment to the Oklahoma City Thunder after the loss.
Chet Holmgren made progress in his return to play protocol.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Oklahoma City Thunder had a 15-game winning streak before this loss.
The Thunder are still on pace to win a historic number of games for the franchise.
